name: compostjs
description: Composable data visualization library for JavaScript
author: Tomas Petricek

scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src/compost/compost.fsproj --run npx vite
scripts.build: dotnet fable src/compost/compost.fsproj -o dist && cp dist/compost.fs.js dist/compost.js
scripts.standalone: dotnet fable src/compost/compost.fsproj --run npx vite build && cp docs/releases/compost-$npm_package_version.js docs/releases/compost-latest.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run standalone && git add . && git commit -m "Update standalone release file in docs" && npm run build
